title: No really, who thought that was a good idea?
body:
The new "Goth" Annie skin could as well be renamed to HotTopic Annie, she lost all of her charm and gothic aspects with the new splash art. I know it's too late to complain and even if, I can't do anything about it anymore anyways, so I just save the old splash on my computer to remind me how Goth Annie was once a thing, before she turned into a girl-that-likes-black-clothes character..

http://i.imgur.com/9LvwuCI.png
^ Old // New v
http://i.imgur.com/b3eG0x4.png

replies.body: Riot makes the game more appealing to kids, the same they'll do with vlad's abilities (most likely)  making them look just like some red coloured magic instead of blood magic.

... like, all of the lore is being made into some games-workshop esque grimdark business and they're making the game for kids?

They change sion from Arnold Schwarzenegger zombie into a gore hungry engine of pain and suffering.

Gangplank goes from pirate mc pirate to bone carving corsair with no love of living things and a thirst for revenge that will drown his hometown in blood. 

The last two adcs they released were 1. A death obsessed serial killer and 2. The physical embodiment of death. 

But I too yearn for the adult themes of the past,  with champions like rammus and teemo

Tl dr; I feel riot is doing anything BUT that.
{{champion:33}} k

One must observe Rammus, so they too may one day become enlightened.

http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/12-21-2015/dDXtPn.gif
What he means is "They make the game more appealing to Chinese Censorship so that Tencent doesn't punish them for misbehaving."
http://i.imgur.com/CZGZOMA.png"

> [{quoted}](name=Szunray,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-19T17:19:31.219+0000)
>
> ... like, all of the lore is being made into some games-workshop esque grimdark business and they're making the game for kids?

Needs more skulls and Ultramarines.... then it will be GW approved.

> [{quoted}](name=halp pls,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-19T16:29:48.854+0000)
>
> Riot makes the game more appealing to kids, the same they'll do with vlad's abilities (most likely)  making them look just like some red coloured magic instead of blood magic.

its so funny how many people keep saying that and yet they didn't do anything to it ? like what gave you that idea ?

> [{quoted}](name=halp pls,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-19T16:29:48.854+0000)
>
> Riot makes the game more appealing to kids, the same they'll do with vlad's abilities (most likely)  making them look just like some red coloured magic instead of blood magic.

Has nothing to do with kids and everything to do with Tencent and the Chinese infiltrating our culture by toning everything down in our beloved game.
You can thank our chinese overlords from Tencent for it.
This is not even the chinese one, ok?
They are the ones who order the censuring around the splashes. Don't be delusional, this is happening.
{{champion:30}} {{item:3070}}

yes. Chinese people, as a collective group of several hundred or more cultures spanning an enormous country, are afraid of makeup and frowns. 
How about we stop being subtley xenophobic and accept that these splash unifications cover and are under the sway of much more people than just NA and CN?

Personally, I just think they wanted to make her cuter for general mass appeal.
Did I day anything about the chienese people as a whole?
"you can thank our chinese overlords"
referring to tencent
This change is part of the global splash update and these changes usually use chinese splash arts. I doubt this splash comes from another region. Do you have any information where it's from else?
The chinee order the censuring- This is not the chinese splash, it was merely modified.
But uhh... I like it. "runs away before downvotes"

Well, design is always an opinion based thing. I like the old splash, some might like the new one. I don't mind others prefering the new one though. I just expressed my thoughts and feelings about this change.
FINALLY!!!  Someone who actually thinks a comment is an opinion, and not an insult!  KittyOfDraktharr, you are a saint!  Keep up the good work!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I also don't dislike the new version. However, regardless of how much I like either the old or new one, I believe this change took away from the theme of the skin. I simply can't come up with a reason for the change at all.

GOTH:

a style of rock music derived from punk, typically with apocalyptic or mystical lyrics.
a member of a subculture favoring black clothing, white and black makeup, and goth music.


no where in that does it require them to be gloomy and sad. 

I am glad they changed annie from the ignorant stereotype of what goth means. 

she is still very much goth. just because her mystical manipulation of tibbers gives her glee instead of sorrow, doesn't change that fact. 

in fact, i feel it matchers her in-game character from her quotes much better.
Because the title "the Dark Child" doesn't mean shit i guess.
it reflects her abilities and origin not her personality.
Yeah, that's why all of her quotes are cutesy giggles and invitations to play. For that extra touch of demonism.

No, it's her twisted personality. She likes burning people but in a more psychopatic way rather than maniacal. The Goth skin just shows her angry. You could say the League trailer where the new Baron was introduced, when Annie was smiling for a moment and hugging Tibbers she was  "Normal" but then got angry and threw her bear at Tryndamere.

{{champion:1}} : -giggle- have you seen my bear tibbers? you smell like BURNING! let's count to five!

...just because you like to imagine that Annie is grimdark doesn't mean that she is or ever was.

Although I agree the goth subculture is often generalized into sad and gloomy, its not like its for no reason, as the origins of the word Gothic is from the language/Germanic people sub-type, and then used to describe building architecture. Then it became used to describe art, specifically "barbaric" looking art in way of ugly proportions and strange compositions that weren't appealing to the eye as the more classical arts styles were. And then to describe music, sometimes as "Gloomy, and melancholy" to then finally describe the subculture that developed off of that music.

So its easy for people to want whats advertised I guess, even if its a slightly wrong advertisement.

I see, this does make sense. I am not particularly disatisfied with her changes, but I feel it's a little weird still to see someone say "she's lost her gothig look" becuase, well, no, she hasn't. she just looks gothic in a different way.

but, it is good to know that it isn't out of the gothic history, for the association of anger/pain with goth.

> [{quoted}](name=ashe maokai sona,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-19T16:50:36.723+0000)
>
> GOTH:
> 
> a style of rock music derived from punk, typically with apocalyptic or mystical lyrics.
> a member of a subculture favoring black clothing, white and black makeup, and goth music.
> 
> 
> no where in that does it require them to be gloomy and sad. 
> 
> I am glad they changed annie from the ignorant stereotype of what goth means. 
> 
> she is still very much goth. just because her mystical manipulation of tibbers gives her glee instead of sorrow, doesn't change that fact. 
> 
> in fact, i feel it matchers her in-game character from her quotes much better.

I agree with you, but I wanted to point out that I think the joke of the skin is that it fits the stereotype.  It's not meant to be a social message, just a skin to have fun with.

I think people liked it BECAUSE of the stereotype if you will.
Interesting and effective dissenting opinion. it is reasoning like this that should give some people solace regarding the change.
I'm also rather dissapointed. That splash used to be one of my favourites, and it resembled her in-game model more in the older one as well.

Goth, yes; Emo, no
THESE ARE NOT THE SAME THING PEOPLE

my tl;dr

Emo = dead inside
Goth = dead outside
I can't even look at the new splash it is offensive to the eyes and soul.
Good, she is now gothic. Not emo

i think the new one is more horrible
that face looks...like a walking doll...
srsly has anyone ever seen Japanese horror movies?
Communism at work

This, Cottontail Teemo, that fucking godawful Talon splash change... there's so many that we can't even band together and contest them like we could with the Fiora one. 
I just wish SOMEBODY from Riot would even acknowledge how many people are just straight up unhappy about these changes.

Don't forget about the Singed cosplay of Talon:
http://img2.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_9852.jpg

whAT THE FUCK. 
WHAT THE FUCK IS RIOT DOING.

Honestly, the change makes me more inclined to buy the skin. I was annoyed when they got rid of Frostfire Annie's smirk in favor of a more generic grumpy face, because she always struck me as a champion who had FUN massacring her enemies with fire and doom. If anything, I think the change here makes her look more like Wednesday Addams and less like Marylin Manson - that might be a problem to some people out there, but to me, it just fits her a lot better.

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Badger,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2016-04-19T23:35:37.504+0000)
>
> Honestly, the change makes me more inclined to buy the skin. I was annoyed when they got rid of Frostfire Annie's smirk in favor of a more generic grumpy face, because she always struck me as a champion who had FUN massacring her enemies with fire and doom. If anything, I think the change here makes her look more like Wednesday Addams and less like Marylin Manson - that might be a problem to some people out there, but to me, it just fits her a lot better.

Wednesday doesn't smile though. So this makes no sense.

> [{quoted}](name=Clumsy Bobble,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RTzvqoEq,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-04-20T03:33:41.797+0000)
>
> Wednesday doesn't smile though. So this makes no sense.

http://cdn4.teen.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/wednesday-addams-smiling.gif
didn't riot put out a notice saying all replaced splashes are temps except for officials  in patch notes like eve, ram, etc?
I think her face is too bright and doesn't match the shading of the rest of the picture.....

I've already reverted back to the old one there.

Same with Vindicator Vayne (who did those glasses, Tencent!?) - orginal Vayne splash too for that matter - Graves ([to the one with the cigar](http://oi65.tinypic.com/xqo3.jpg  )), my precious PAX Sivir, Artic Warfare Caitlyn (she's British, not a slut, you muppets! _Homage to Michael "Psycho" Sykes_), first release of the King of Clubs Mordekaiser (to the one with the "offensive" cross on the chair), Fiora's and Ahri's original splash. And many more.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/jcb2a7zpzofa08v/LolClient%202016-01-23%2016-41-30-26.jpg?dl=0 https://www.dropbox.com/s/ke07nptuuim9kpt/League%20of%20Legends%202016-01-23%2020-42-48-85.jpg?dl=0
Yeah, this bothers me.
